name: Our Casual Battlefield
description:
A new kind of smash-and-grab battle!
Enjoy the realistic behavior of objects and accidental 3D action!

--- Three mini-games to play by smashing objects ---
Survival Stage: Fight off zombies that attack one after another.
A target shooting stage: Hit boxes flowing on a conveyor belt.
The Boss Challenge Stage: You face off against powerful monsters in single combat.

--- Two styles of play that connect you with other players ---
In single-player mode: Perform well in each mini-game in order to move up the online ranking.
In Multiplayer: You can fight and cooperate with other players online!

--- Immediately dive into an exciting play space ---
The game is named "Casual", so you can choose a character and start playing right away!
The action is intuitive, with buttons assigned to each hand and foot! The characters are like your alter ego!
The exhilaration of smashing huge objects is addictive!


--- Reference about Multiplayer ---
There are 3 steps to play!
1. Enter your nickname and log in to the server.
2. Create a room or join an existing room.
3. Set the game you want to play in the waiting room and start the game!

You can text chat with players in the room at any time.
(If you find like-minded people, you can also voice chat with them on Discord, etc.!)
